text: Kinva tumhi ase na mhanave ki jara amacyavara grantha avatarita jhala asata tara amhi tyancyapeksa adhika satya margavara rahilo asato. Tevha tumacyajavala tumacya palanakartyatarphe spasta pramana ani margadarsana va daya ye'una pohocali ahe. Maga tyahuna jasta atyacari kona ahe, jyane allahacya ayatinna khote tharavile ani tyancyakaduna tonda phiravile amhi lavakaraca asa lokanna motha sakta azaba de'u je amacya ayatinkaduna tonda phiravitata
